verbs.description: suspect slips away from sacramento home [V: following] [ARG2: standoff] a standoff in south sacramento ended overnight but police are still looking for the suspect the incident began around 8 p m when an armed man entered an occupied home in the 7100 block of clearbrook way police said the people inside did not know the man the residents were able to escape from their home police said police searched the house but the man was n’t inside it not clear when the man left the home sacramento police also modesto california kcra tv stockton sacramento modesto sacramento california kcra clearbrook way stockton california
